credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Baptismal font
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, on paper
description: Sketch of a decorative architectural element, consisting of a double-convex bowl on a foot with a carved mask, supporting a pyramidal arrangement of a pediment-like form below acanthus, winged cherub heads, and garlands, below the finial orb and cross.
name: Drawing
